flawed_nl_solution:
The clay pot costs $20 + $9 = $<<20+9=29>>29.
The bag of soil costs $9 - $2 = $<<9-2=11>>11.
The cost to plant the flowers is $9 + $29 + $11 = $<<9+29+11=49>>49.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 7, not 11. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
